text: Approval for the following modifications to the LithoTron(TM) Lithotripsy System: 1) replacement of the transportable C-arm fluoroscopy system with an upgraded, stationary x-ray imaging system, 2) replacement of the existing patient table with one that offers Trendelenburg positioning, and 3) the addition of motorized movement of the shock wave therapy head.  The device is indicated for use in patients with renal and upper ureteral calculi between 4mm and 20mm in size.
